events.message: The client reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of June 1st involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight.
After review, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of personal vehicle damage and injuries.
An insurance agent was assigned to assist the client throughout the claim process for their auto accident.
The auto accident claim has been formally acknowledged, and the client was thanked for promptly reporting the incident.
Requested the client to submit a police report, photos of damage, and medical bills related to the vehicle collision.
The client successfully uploaded the requested documentation, including accident photos and the official police accident report.
An investigation was initiated to verify the circumstances of the auto accident and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded with findings that support the claim, confirming the collision was caused by another vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the estimated vehicle repair costs and medical expenses submitted by the client.
The client provided positive feedback regarding the prompt handling of their auto accident claim and clear communication.
The claim has been officially approved following the acceptance of the proposed settlement terms by the client.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim settlement has been processed and dispatched to the client's account.
The auto accident claim is now closed after successful payment and confirmation from the client that all issues are resolved.
